<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>false</action_insert><action_query>true</action_query><action_update>false</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>x_1117801_gym_mngt_transactions</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition/><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>My Enrolled Members</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*, display*/) {
    // Check your condition here
    if (current.member == 'Andrew Jackson') {
        // If the condition is met, set the menu item to be visible
        current.visible = true;
    } else {
        // If the condition is not met, set the menu item to be invisible
        current.visible = false;
    }
})(current, previous);
]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-11-28 00:43:26</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>9e50241197f2711070d034100153affb</sys_id><sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count><sys_name>My Enrolled Members</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Gym Management" source="x_1117801_gym_mngt">5f9f328a976a311070d034100153af49</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Gym Management">5f9f328a976a311070d034100153af49</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_9e50241197f2711070d034100153affb</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-11-28 00:44:43</sys_updated_on><template/><when>after</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=9e50241197f2711070d034100153affb"/></record_update>
